name: David Vincent
text: Take a section of the city, paint the houses blue, and create a tourist attraction. I think the real attraction is speaking with the people who live and work in the area. Like the colorful village next to this area, it needs some TLC. It's great to visit if you have time and are close by.

Kampung Biru. Desa biru.
Seluruh desa dicat biru dan indah.

name: Lukmanul Hakim
text: Memang asyik menyusuri sepanjang lorong Dari kampung warna warni melalui  jembatan yang menjulang tinggi, berdebar debar jantung Karna ketinggian jembatan, naamun inilah yang mrmbuat pemandangan semakin indah dengan latar sungai, jembatan kerea api, semajin seru ditempat INI.

name: Lars Kamsteeg
text: Baiklah, tidak ada yang istimewa. Tapi warna birunya sangat indah! Kamu tidak bisa benar-benar menghibur diri di sana terlalu lama, mungkin paling lama 20-30 menit. Kombinasi ini cocok sekali dengan Rainbow Village.

name: mo jeong
text: Di dalam desa, yang dinding dan atapnya dicat biru, anak-anak bermain di gang-gang, menawarkan sekilas kehidupan penduduk yang semarak. Gang-gang tersebut beraspal indah, sehingga memudahkan berjalan kaki.

name: Lennard Meseck
text: The Blue village Was even better than the rainbow Village on the other side of the road. Free entry and just a bit cleaner. We've seen so many cool streatarts and cute very Blue little Alleys. Conbined with the Rainbow Village definetly worth a shot and also a good photo Spot.

name: Krystal Erickson
text: Fun to walk around if you're in Malang! We spent about 0.5-1 hour walking around and taking photos of the blue houses. It is shabby and needs restoring, but was charming. There are two different entrances that charge you IDR 5K and 10K, but you get a souvenir with them.
